snippet: Mrs. Fiorina is among the presidential candidates trying to stay within federal rules, maneuvering around the gray areas and the loopholes while keeping campaign plans out in the open.

byline.contributor: Nicholas Confessore and Trip Gabriel contributed reporting from New York.

abstract: Carly Fiorina's campaign is taking advantage of gray areas in law concerning coordination between campaigns and super PACs by making her travel schedules available so that outside groups can arrange and finance her events; other candidates who are heavily reliant on super PACs are also employing strategy.
lead_paragraph: Mrs. Fiorina is among the presidential candidates trying to stay within federal rules, maneuvering around the gray areas and the loopholes while keeping campaign plans out in the open.

headline.print_headline: Fiorina’s ‘Super PAC’ Gives Help in Plain Sight
headline.main: Carly Fiorina’s ‘Super PAC’ Aids Her Campaign, in Plain Sight
